Name: Rusty Tack Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A ginger riff on the Rusty Nail .
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2010 in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Rusty Tack Cocktail contains 174 calories
